title: FS: Donnie Bush severe caption (brown) shift
author: Pat R

posts.post_title: FS: Donnie Bush severe caption (brown) shift
posts.post_content:
$575 PP no fees or $592 Regular PP shipping included. Sold

These are very rare with the caption in the players image I've
only seen one other with this type of shift a Newt Randall.
